person.persName: John Richard True (Owen County, Kentucky, resident and soldier (11th KY Cav USA))

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Son of John True and Mary Ward True. Resident of Owen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 22, 1862 to May 25, 1865.
